tweets.text: A (long) thread describing peatland restoration on Matterdale Common carried out by @cumbriawildlife working closely with local commoners @herdyshepherd1 @NT_TheNorth @NECumbria @EnvAgencyNW 1/12 https://t.co/bohM0Wbz7m

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @SimonTagg you need to start petitioning @PersimmonHomes . I‚Äôm sure that they won‚Äôt want any prospective customers knowing about the smell coming from 100 yards away from where they are building.

Y'day, @metecoban92, @chrismylesk & I wrote to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea & associated waterways. It builds on letter @jonburkeUK & I sent before.
It's unacceptable residents, wildlife & visitors have to put up with this.
Thanks to those who got in touch. https://t.co/cISAOKNhoP

Find of the day was a moped!! Sadly failed its MOT. Amazing what 6 strong women can do in a few hours. Can't wait for @EnvAgency to take on some responsibility and help get this river sorted. We are scratching the surface. @mayorofhackney https://t.co/0k5TJMclyg

Well done to @StinkStopthe for mobilising people power today. Hundreds of local people attended the protest. The @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_uk must listen and close down Walleys Quarry landfill and move to the restoration phase of the site now! https://t.co/khbLjmEs27

@EnvAgency data shows @AnglianWater released RAW SEWAGE into the River Lark from the Fornham All Saints STW on 16 occasions for a total of 199 hours in 2020 and from the Great Welnetham¬†STW on 15 occasions for a total of 239.75 hours. Let them know this is not acceptable!! https://t.co/YiCUH8RkG1

Help keep our beaches #LitterFree this #BankHoliday weekend.

Litter left on the beach or next to full bins can easily be blown into the sea.

If a bin is full, take your rubbish home to throw away or recycle.

#RespectProtectEnjoy #BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/jDF0ha77ic

The dataset includes 10 (one for each Water and Sewerage Company with storm overflows in England) files describing how often and for how long, monitored storm overflows discharged during 2020. tweets.text: I pay tribute to our skilled teams and partners who worked so hard to achieve this - it‚Äôs not easy to bring major infrastructure projects in on time and on budget.
